the police on crowd control were well behaved | even towards young black men .
some rebel firework users . what better way to celebrate a rebellion ?
station is closed . time to walk a few more blocks .
output.sentences: There were firewords for the Fourth of July.
It was a perfectly warm, pleasant night.
The police arrived for crowd control.
There were rebellious people there causing trouble.
Then it was time to walk to the station.
